Content: ——————————NL          ViZe ClanNL——————————NLNLAbout UsNLViZe is a relatively new and fast-growing Fortnite clan. We accept PC_ PS4_ Mobile and Xbox. We’re looking for skilled players that can help us get out there in the Fortnite community with our skill.NLNL➤ Pro Players (Competitive)NLIn order to compete in events_ we need the best of the best to play for our team. We will be doing weekly scrims and clan vs other clans.NLNL➤ Our GoalsNLCurrently we have some goals that we are going for. Our main goal is that we are trying to promote skill in our clan and improve our players skill and also recruit people that have high skill. We are also trying to recruit players that are also skilled in streaming and creating content. Also_ we are looking to grow our population of representatives. NLNL➤ How To HelpNLYou can help out by showing interest in being a designer_ editor_ content creator/streamer and representative.NLNL➤What We OfferNL+ Active ChatsNL+ Various Voice ChatsNL+ Scrim MatchesNL+ EventsNL+ ApplicationsNL+ Clan BattlesNLNLDm me for more information.
